And she <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>Tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to me,

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7121>read:<s%>

<S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender,<s%> and you have <S%H3665>humbled<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, that they should <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and have <S%H7167>rent<s%> your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; I <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold<s%> <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> I will <S%H622>gather<s%> you to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and you shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%> And they <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>
